<a id="RenderData"></a>

# RenderData

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [RenderDataExtension](RenderDataExtension.md), [RenderDataRD](RenderDataRD.md)

Abstract render data object, holds frame data related to rendering a single frame of a viewport.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Abstract render data object, exists for the duration of rendering a single viewport.

\ **Note:** This is an internal rendering server object, do not instantiate this from script.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="RenderData_method_get_camera_attributes"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **get_camera_attributes**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RenderData_method_get_camera_attributes)

Returns the [RID](RID.md) of the camera attributes object in the [RenderingServer](RenderingServer.md) being used to render this viewport.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RenderData_method_get_environment"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RID](RID.md) **get_environment**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RenderData_method_get_environment)

Returns the [RID](RID.md) of the environment object in the [RenderingServer](RenderingServer.md) being used to render this viewport.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RenderData_method_get_render_scene_buffers"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RenderSceneBuffers](RenderSceneBuffers.md) **get_render_scene_buffers**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RenderData_method_get_render_scene_buffers)

Returns the [RenderSceneBuffers](RenderSceneBuffers.md) object managing the scene buffers for rendering this viewport.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="RenderData_method_get_render_scene_data"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[RenderSceneData](RenderSceneData.md) **get_render_scene_data**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#RenderData_method_get_render_scene_data)

Returns the [RenderSceneData](RenderSceneData.md) object managing this frames scene data.
